system.description: Expert-level combat training emphasizing skill and adaptability.

levelDescriptions.1: 2 attacks per melee round. +2 to roll with punch/fall/impact, +2 to pull punch.
levelDescriptions.5: Kick attacks: Karate style kick does 2D4 damage and any two of choice.
levelDescriptions.6: Critical strike on an unmodified roll of 18, 19 or 20.
levelDescriptions.10: +3 to damage and an additional +2 to pull punch.
levelDescriptions.11: Knockout/stun on an unmodified roll of 18, 19 or 20.
levelDescriptions.13: Critical strike (triple damage) or knockout from behind.
levelDescriptions.15: Death Blow on a roll of a natural 20 (if desired).
